value.name: New Records Shed Light on Shooting of Black Man by Fort Lauderdale Cop
value.description: A grainy cellphone video is one of few pieces of video evidence released thus far from the night Barry Gedeus was shot dead.

video.name: New Records Shed Light on Shooting of Black Man by Fort Lauderdale Cop

value.name: Fort Lauderdale Cop in March Shooting Has Long History of Use-of-Force Reviews
value.description: Barry Gedeus (center) was shot to death by Fort Lauderdale police Officer Robert Morris. On the night of March 8, Fort Lauderdale police responded to a report of a sexual battery near the 2400 block of NW Sixth Court, according to a press release from the ...

value.name: They high-fived police officers, but these young Black men still have their concerns
value.description: Eighteen of them were Black and unarmed, including Mycael Johnson, 31, and Barry Gedeus, 27, who were fatally shot in Tallahassee and Fort Lauderdale, respectively, in March 2020. “If we look at ...
